```{r House Keeping, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache=F}

library(lpSolve)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, cache=F}

obj.fun <- c(3, 2)

constr <- matrix(c(2, 1, 1, 1, 0, -1, 1, 0, -1, 0), ncol = 2, byrow=
                   TRUE)

constr.dir <- c("<=", "<=", "<=", "<=", "<=")

rhs <- c(100, 80, 0, 40, 0)

prod.sol <- lp("max", obj.fun, constr, constr.dir, rhs, compute.sens = TRUE)

```
